Application Development¶

Setting up the SDK in popular IDEs and compilers and other general application development topics:

SDK Libraries Overview of the Leap Motion SDK.
Hello World A quick introduction to programming with the Leap Motion controller.
Setting Up a Project How to setup projects in Eclipse, IntelliJ, and NetBrains, as well as using command-line tools.
Using Processing Using the Leap Motion libraries in Processing’s Java mode.
System Architecture System-level view of the Leap Motion software.
Runtime Configuration How to set configuration options for the Leap Motion service.
